column4: Hello, I am having some trouble installing a piece of software on Ubuntu. It is a tar.gz file, I am doing a "make" command from the terminal and it does a whole load of stuff and then gives me an error: undefined reference to `atk_object_add_relationship'
before trying to compile something from source, make sure that there isn't a existing ubuntu package for it... apt-get install <foo> is considerably easier
Delkster/Adminal_Chicago: I am trying to install Akamaru: http://people.freedesktop.org/~krh/akamaru.git/
